alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL NORTHUMBERLAND... NORTHWESTERN MONTOUR...SOUTHEASTERN LYCOMING...NORTHERN COLUMBIA AND SOUTHEASTERN SULLIVAN COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montoursville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Muncy, Hughesville, Rohrsburg, Iola, Jamison City, Waller, Lairdsville, Ricketts Glen State Park, Central, Exchange, Biggertown, Millville, Benton, Turbotville, Picture Rocks and Stillwater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan
